description: Detects tools extracting LSA secret DPAPI domain backup key from Domain Controllers Author: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: DPAPI Domain Backup Key Extraction
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4662" AND winlog.event_data.ObjectType:"SecretObject" AND winlog.event_data.AccessMask:"0x2" AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:*BCKUPKEY*)
